name: Shock Troops
description: Start with Stun Gun and Compact SMG. Melee strikes damage two targets and do twice more damage when you're not tired. Melee attacks are not slower when tired

name: Juiced Up II
description: Stun Gun effect duration increased by 15%

name: Flash Sale II
description: Killing a stunned special zombie restores 5% of your primary weapon's ammunition

name: Crowd Control
description: Push radius from melee attacks increased by 50%

name: All Elbows
description: Movement speed penalty when zombies are very close reduced by 100%

name: Rooted
description: You can never be pinned down by usual zombies (does not affect special zombies)

name: Crowd Control II
description: Restore one equipment charge when your health drops below 35%

name: Juiced Up
description: Stun Gun effect duration increased by 100%

name: Zeus
description: Increase Stun Gun range by 50% and target count to 20 (base range: 12 m, base target count: 15)

name: High Voltage
description: Stun Gun damage Increased by 150%

name: Clear!
description: Using the Stun Gun on a pinned teammate will get them to their feet

name: Bullet-dodger
description: Take 100% less friendly fire from bullets while performing melee attacks

name: Nimble
description: Take 50% less damage while performing melee attacks

name: With My Last Breath
description: Melee strikes damage 2 more targets when health is below 35%

name: Blood is boiling
description: You deal 50% more damage to special zombies with a melee weapon if your health is below 35%

name: Slice and Dice
description: You and all teammates can perform more melee strikes (+2) before becoming tired

name: Zeus II
description: Increase Stun Gun range by 15% [base: 12 meters]

name: Get lost!
description: Electric Grids can kill 5% more zombies for the whole team

name: Trophy Hunter
description: Deal 25% more damage to special zombies

name: Wheatgrass
description: Health increased by 25%

name: Silent Killer
description: Start with a TMP5 SMG with silencer upgrade

name: Where are you?
description: All Lurkers within 10 meters are automatically marked

name: Vigour
description: Killing 10 zombies in rapid succession with a melee weapon grants temporary health boost (cooldown 30 seconds)

name: Cloak and Dagger
description: Killing 10 zombies in rapid succession with a melee weapon grants a masking effect (cooldown 30 seconds)

name: Third Hand
description: Killing 5 zombies with melee strikes in rapid succession instantly reloads your primary weapon

name: Relentlessly
description: Killing 10 zombies in rapid succession with a melee weapon restores 5% of your health (cooldown: 30 seconds)

name: Heavy Metal I
description: Start with an improved Forest Warrior Chainsaw that deals 50% more damage and has 50% more fuel. All Forest Warrior Chainsaw pickups for you are also improved [base: 100 fuel]

name: Heavy Metal II
description: Starts with improved Taiga-12 Heavy Assault Shotgun that deals 25% more damage and has 25% more ammo. All Taiga-12 Heavy Assault Shotgun pickups for you also improved [base: 50 ammo]

name: Battle Cry
description: Automatically stand up from being pinned after 5 seconds

name: Thank you for the chance
description: 30% chance of using an Adrenaline kit without depleting your supply

name: Executioner
description: Perform 1 more melee strike before becoming tired. Melee damage increased by 50%

name: Executioner III
description: Perform 1 more melee strike before becoming tired

name: Swapping Mags II
description: SMG reload speed is increased by 5%

name: Shock Therapy
description: You will not become fatigued when melee attacking zombies electrified by the Stun Gun

name: Samurai
description: Killing 15 zombies in rapid succession allows you to hit 1 more target per melee strike for 10 seconds

name: Bloodlust
description: Killing special zombies with a melee weapon will increase firearm damage by 100% for 15 seconds

name: This is invigorating
description: Signature Strikes damage 1 more target

name: Spare Batteries
description: Max capacity for Stun Gun charges increased to 4 [base: 83 charges]

name: Pickpocket
description: Killing 15 zombies in rapid succession refills one equipment charge (cooldown 60 seconds)

name: Loan Shark
description: Killing a special zombie gives a 50% chance to restore one charge to your equipment

name: On one's own
description: One equipment charge gets restored for you every 60 seconds

name: Flash Sale
description: Using the Stun Gun restores 1% of your primary weapon's ammunition for every target you stun.

name: Swapping Mags!
description: SMGs' reload speed increased by 25%

name: Adrenaline
description: Reload speed increased by 50% when health is below 35%

name: Dead... reward
description: Killing 10 zombies in rapid succession with a melee weapon restores 5% of your primary weapon's ammunition

name: Blade Master
description: Melee strikes damage 1 more target

name: Nimble II
description: Take 10% less damage while performing melee attacks

name: Wheatgrass II
description: Health increased by 5%
